text: Alpine Lake / Ata Puai is a small lake in the West Coast Region of New Zealand. The lake is located south of Okarito and west of the larger Lake Mapourika. "Alpine" is something of a misnomer as the lake is only from the sea and at an elevation of less than 100m.New Zealand 1:50000 Topographic Map Series sheet BW15 – Okarito ==References== Category:Westland District Category:Lakes of the West Coast, New Zealand
title: Alpine Lake / Ata Puai
